pages.text: Ducks can be found both swimming in the water and walking on land.$(br2)You can attract Ducks with Duckweed and breed them giving those to them as well.$(br2)On death they may drop Feathers and Raw Duck.$(br2)You can cook Raw Duck to make Cooked Duck as well.
Sometines they drops Duck Eggs, you can use them like commons Egg or even cook Fried Eggs.
